title: Get lifetime access to 500GB of cloud backup for 66% off
content:
Macworld

Cloud storage is essential in today’s digital working world. For the many of us who have come to rely on Google Drive, there’s an intuitive, easy-to-use, and affordable alternative that’s on sale for a limited time only. You can get 250GB with FolderFort for only $39.99, and 500GB for $59.99.

FolderFort is great for small teams of collaborators because it supports creating unlimited workspaces. It features shareable links that you can use to easily share files and data with co-workers, clients, or collaborators. You can also set links to public or private to make sure they’re accessible to only those you deem qualified. 

Store files affordably with this simple and intuitive platform. Save on either of these lifetime deals: 

  • FolderFort 250GB Storage Plan lifetime subscription, on sale for $39.99 (reg. $107)
  • FolderFort 500GB Storage Plan lifetime subscription, on sale for $59.99 (reg. $179)

StackSocial prices subject to change.
